Biscuits

side

Ingredients

  • 2 cups AP flour
  • 1 tbsp baking powder
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 1/3 cup cold butter (grated)
  • 2/3 cup milk

Procedure

  1. Preheat oven to 425
  2. Whisk together flour, salt, baking powder
  3. Add the grated butter and cut in until crumbly
  4. Add milk and combine until dough just comes together
  5. Turn dough out onto floured surface and pat to a 1/2 inch thickness
  6. Cut with 2 1/2 inch biscuit cutter
  7. Place biscuits just touching on a sheet pan lined with parchment paper
  8. Using a thumb, depress the middle of the biscuit so it is just barely dimpled
  9. Bake 10-15 minutes until golden.
